Text:
Well, this was way better, but please don't call this HOUSE!, this is top 40 commersial SHIT!

And where the remixes, really, for example, the Groovestylerz - We Are Family 2007, that's nothing that you have done, more then fockin it up, so it sounds crap!

I have the orignials, and it sounds the same, but lacks master tempo hicups, so what kind of gear do ya use?

Maybe you should spend a few bux on some quality gear, just a tip!

Well, i don't know about you, but if i was a customer @ a nightclub and heard this kind of mixing i would ask för a refund!

Beat and Harmony is KEY to a perfect evening in a nightclub

Try to mix to trax that Really match eachother and you'll se and hear what i mean!

Beat isn't all when it comes to beatmixing.

And yeah, when you mix, try to squeeze the good bits as long as you can, tha'ts what seperates a good deejay from a really bad one!

10 sek mixes can anyone do "blindfolded"

take care

/S

hej dj seven..
måste självklart svara på detta..
för det första..
så remixar jag kommersial house..
o inte underground..
detta är house remixes jag fått ifrån skivbolagen..
så om du tycker deras remixar är fel..så kan jag inget göra..
detta enda jag gör är att sätta ihop dom i en skön megamix..
som ex..
Groovestylerz - We Are Family 2007, that's nothing that you have done, more then fockin it up, so it sounds crap!..
så har jag fått så det är väl dom som skickar skit..

dessutom så gick jag in på din sida..o lyssnade på dina megamixar..
o kan säga att det va med kommersial house..med ex..eye of the tiger..bille jean.mm
o mixarna lät precis som mina.förutom att ni mixade i sången..men jag är inte här för att hugga..

mvh p-mix

Hmmm..Wonder why you guys argueing about the way you mixes..I think that both of you are very good, I was DJ back in the 80's up to 1998 and still loves all of it but of course different people different ears, but the MASTER is indeed Ben Liebrand every DJ could learn a thing or more listening to him, but for now ;You're both really DJ SEVEN & P-MIX!! "DJ KILLER C" in Denmark!
